name: Explottens
detailed_description:
Explottens is a heart pumping, hair raising, pawtastic shoot ‘em up that follows K.I.T the pilot and his band of misfits as they zip, boost, and shoot through the sky, battling the ferocious felines known as K.L.A.W! Dominate the skies and battle your way through an army of evil cats just waiting to turn you into their purrrsonal scratching post. Unlock weapons, aircrafts, and spectacular sidekicks as you explode your way through this catacular adventure because with Explottens; the sky’s the limit!

Feature


  • BOSSES
    Test your skills by battling bosses that are bigger, better, and badder than the ones before.

  • MISSIONS
    Put your brawn and brains to the test while you earn coins and experience!

  • SIDEKICKS
    Take a trusty companion along as they help out with providing cover and some comic relief!

  • SHOP
    Invest your hard earned coins in extra firepower from Front guns, Rear guns, and plane upgrades!

About we.R.play:

Though it may have started from the humble beginning in 2010, we.R.play has gone on to become the first Pakistani studio to have their game, Lost Twins, featured as the Editor's Choice on the Google Play Store. In addition to becoming the leaders of Gender Diversity in Pakistan, one of their biggest titles has flourished into a standalone IP, the endless runner; Run Sheeda Run, a game that embodies all that is Pakistani and has created a loyal fan following around it.

Special Thanks

Big shout out to Estudio Cafofo for helping us out with all sounds! You guys rock :D
